snippet: Verizon and Comcast have gotten awfully close lately, and politicians have taken notice. The two companies have made two separate deals that essentially make them partners.
abstract: Verizon and Comcast have gotten awfully close lately, and politicians have taken notice. The two companies have made two separate deals that essentially make them partners.
lead_paragraph: Verizon, the nation's top wireless carrier, and Comcast, the cable company, have gotten awfully close lately, and politicians have taken notice.

headline.main: Verizon's Cozying Up With Comcast Draws Attention
